typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as integer,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as integer,
		product as integer,
		units as integer,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrdersInputSource
source(output(
		customerid as string,
		fullname as string,
		address as string,
		credit as string,
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
